compile.binary: public cclass AAA { public void m() {} } public cclass BBB { public void n() {} }
public cclass AAA { public void m() {} } public cclass BBB extends AAA { }
public interface AAA { public void m(); }
public interface AAA { public void m(); } public interface CCC extends AAA { }
public interface AAA { public void m(); } abstract public cclass CCC implements AAA { }

compile-check-error.description: Test calls to methods with same name but different return types
no common root method in superclasses
compile-check-error.binary: public cclass AAA { public int m() { return 2; } } public cclass BBB { public String m() { return ""; } }

compile-run.description: methods with same signature and same return type in different ancestors
compile-run.test: DDD d = new DDD(); assertEquals("AAA", d.m()); // mixin linearization

compile.description: test indirect inheritance with overwrite method
compile.binary: public cclass A { public void m() {} } public cclass B extends A { public void m() {} }

compile-run.description: test multiple and indirect inheritance with overwrite method
compile-run.test: D d = new D(); assertEquals("B", d.m());
compile-run.code: public cclass D extends B & C { }

compile.description: methods with same signature and same return types from inside
compile.binary: public cclass A { public void m() {} } public cclass B { public void m() {} }

compile-check-error.description: methods with same signature but different return types from inside
compile-check-error.binary: public cclass A { public int m() { return 1; } } public cclass B { public String m() { return "Hello"; } }
